p: Twenty-one municipalities with YFV transmission locally confirmed were surveyed, being 20 in the three most affected states (MG, ES and RJ), that recorded a total of 73.5% of confirmed human cases, and one in Bahia (BA) where only NPH infections were confirmed. We selected five out these municipalities because they had been surveyed prior to local YFV transmission, and the remaining 16 municipalities were chosen taking into account the local incidence of human cases and epizootic records and the proximity to the great metropolitan areas in RJ, ES, MG and BA ( Figure 1).
